form.title: Are you a US citizen or Permanent Resident?

Lambda School is committed to building a diverse and inclusive environment. We are collecting data to use as a benchmark for our efforts and are requesting your participation. Feel free to opt out by selecting "Prefer not to answer".
What is your date of birth?
What gender category do you identify with?
What race or ethnicity do you identify as?
A new Lambda School class begins on the first Monday of each month. What month (or months) are you applying for?
Tell us about what schools you have attended and degrees you have achieved.
form.description: Use separate lines for each school

form.title: Tell us about your work experience (employers, positions/titles)
form.description: Use separate lines for each job, most recent first

form.title: Which of the following best describes your programming experience?
options: No experience: but I'm excited to start learning!
Beginning learner: I've played with some introductory coding lessons and tutorials
Intermediate learner: I have completed some coding classes or tutorials
Advanced: I am familiar with OO programming and can create simple applications
Professional: I'm an experienced software engineer and want to upgrade my skills

form.title: Please tell us in one or two sentences about the most impressive thing that you have built or achieved
Why would you be a good candidate for Lambda School?
Lambda School is an immersive program that lasts six months, 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. Pacific. Will you be able to attend **ALL** class sessions in their entirety?
Do you have any other commitments during the time you are applying for?
How will you support yourself financially during the six months of Lambda School?
If accepted, what payment method will you be using?
options: $10,000 up-front + 17% of salary for one year
$0 up-front + 17% of salary for two years
